title: Choice Of Distinctive 2 And 3 Bedroom Residences, Easy Access To IH-45
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1068 Sq.
Located just 10 minutes north of Conroe, 45 minutes north of downtown Houston and 10 minutes east of Bentwater Yacht Club Harbour and Resort on Lake Conroe.

Nestled in Montgomery County on the edge of Texas’s piney woods, Cricket Hollow is located between two spectacular, protected natural environments – the 21,000-acre Lake Conroe and the 163,000 acre Sam Houston National Forest.
Close to local shopping at the Conroe Outlet Mall and a multitude of dining and entertainment options are a short drive south to the award winning master planned community, The Woodlands.
Montgomery County Texas is one of the nation’s fastest growing and most sought after places to live.
- Full Size Washer-Dryer Connections In Every Unit
- Dishwasher And Stainless Double Sink With Disposal
- Choice Of Distinctive 2 And 3 Bedroom Residences
- Electric Range With Oven And Built-In Microwave
- Minutes from Lake Conroe & other nearby Recreation
